meanings.definition: A type of seaweed used in food products for its thickening properties.
meanings.sent1: The chef added carageens to the soup to make it thicker.
meanings.sent2: Carageens are often used in dairy products to improve texture.
meanings.sent3: The carageens in the pudding made it so thick, it bounced like a ball!
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth as carageens, calming everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The carageens wrapped around the dish like a cozy blanket, making it rich and creamy.

meanings.definition: The act of using carageens as a thickening agent in cooking.
meanings.sent1: Cooking with carageens requires patience and precision.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for the addition of carageens to achieve the desired consistency.
meanings.sent3: She performed a carageens dance in the kitchen while thickening the sauce.
meanings.sent4: The carageens of knowledge thickened her culinary skills over time.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the stew thickened with carageens filled the entire house with warmth.

meanings.definition: The quality of being derived from carageens.
meanings.sent1: The carageens essence in the dessert gave it a unique flavor.
meanings.sent2: The smooth texture of the ice cream was due to the carageens origin.
meanings.sent3: His carageens-inspired painting captured the essence of the sea.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a carageens-like quality, spreading joy to all around.
meanings.sent5: The carageens touch in the dish elevated it to a gourmet level.
